p: On the other hand, limonene, linalool, menthone, and pulegone exhibited low or almost null antioxidant activity determined by DPPH and ABTS methods, and this activity did not exceed the 25% at 1 mg/mL [Figure 2a and 2b]. However, limonene presented the higher antioxidant activity (98.74%), followed by thymol (98.57%), linalool (75.88%), and ascorbic acid (62.43%) [ Figure 2c].
